Choose a point within range to fill a [1] radius for the duration. The darkness spreads around corners.

A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

Choose an object you are holding or one that isn't being worn or carried.

The darkness will emanate from the object and move with it. Completely covering the source of the darkness with an opaque object, such as a bowl or a helm, blocks the darkness.

A blinded creature can't see and automatically fails any ability check that requires sight.

Attack rolls against the creature have adAdvantagevantage, and the creature's attack rolls have disadvantage.

A heavily obscured creature is hidden from sight within a thick cloud or opaque fog. Attack rolls against the creature have Disadvantage.

The creature is effectively Blinded while heavily obscured.

A creature inside magical darkness is heavily obscured, and attack rolls against the the creature have disadvantage.

The creature is Blinded and cannot perceive anything that relies on sight, unless it possesses an ability to see through magical darkness.
